User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: http://localhost:5173/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin paths (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /api/

# Allow important paths
Allow: /articles/
Allow: /events/
Allow: /careers/
Allow: /services/
Allow: /business-automation/

# Host
Host: http://localhost:5173
